english.segment1: looks a lot like givin' up. peace will bring is a bitter cup. set our bodies down like offerings. while we pray to the god of the lesser things
english.segment2: if the wind should shake this house apart. the cradle hits the ground with a broken heart. we will say we never knew a thing. while we pray to the god of the lesser things
english.segment3: Chorus: is there grace for the wayward heart. is there grace for the wayward heart. grace, grace
english.segment4: ash to ash and dust to dust. steel on steel or rain to rust. what mortal breath blood money brings. forth from the altar of the lesser things
english.segment5: is there grace for the wayward heart
english.segment6: is there grace for the wayward heart is there grace, grace
